com.smjourney.entity

Class ScoutShip

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smjourney.entity.Entity
      • com.smjourney.entity.Ship
        • com.smjourney.entity.ScoutShip
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Destructible, Moveable

    public class ScoutShip
extends Ship
    This ship type is characterized by very high thrusters, low shields, low capacity, and medium attack. These ships can get in and out of conflict fast, causing decent amounts of damage in groups, but cannot withstand large amounts of damage themselves. Fleets have a large amount of these ships.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • operate

        public void operate()
        Deals damage to the target ship and clears target from the ship data (turns ship if neccesary)
        Overrides:
        operate in class Ship
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - There is no target specified or ship is depleted.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - The target is out of range.
